introduction_to_audio::markdown_card_1::: Turabahanura dushimitse yuko mwoheraheza urutonde rw'ivyigwa vy'umutekano n'ubumenyeshamakuru imbere yuko mutangura. Izo nyigisho zirangwa mugice c'amajwi (section audio), ariko zirakwiriye yuko uzitaho cane. Atazo ukurikiranye, birashoboka yuko wishira mungorane canke ukazishiramwo abandi.
introduction_to_audio::title: Intangamarara : Isaha imwe
introduction_to_audio::markdown_card_0:::
Abantu barakunda kubwirana inkuru. Rimwe na rimwe izi nkuru zigenda zirahererekanwa kuva kuri basokuru gushika ku bakiri bato. Gukwiragiza inkuru biciye mukiyago birashaje gusumba iradio.  
Uno munsi amajwi yabaye uburyo bukomeye gusumba ubukoreshwa bwose mu guhanahana amakuru kwâ€™isi, kandi ibikoresho hamwe nuburyo bwogutangura amajwi buraboneka cane gusumba ibindi bihe vyose. Uruntode rw'ivyigwa vyerekeye amajwi rurantanga inyigisho zihambaye ukeneye kugira utangure gukora amajwi meza.
